CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 2, 1960, pg. A9 reads: "Second Prize - The Indian table, with its shrimp rice and chicken curry, took second prize at the Brotherhood Food Festival at the Hotel Penn-Sheraton, last Saturday. Left to right: Mrs. Bwana Rao, Mrs. Ranl Tarneja, festival chairman; Miss Sushma Mathur, program participant, and Mrs. Wimla Fernando."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, from left: Bwana Rao, Ranl Tarneja, Sushma Mathur, and Wimla Fernando, standing behind Indian table in Penn Sheraton Hotel for Brotherhood Food Festival
